Message.0: I'll be working remotely as I moved to Imadol last night. I'm not feeling well, so I'll be taking breaks to rest throughout the day.
Message.1: Been feeling sick since yesterday. I'll be resting for the first half of the day. I'll join office in the second half.
Message.2: Since nobody will be present at home tomorrow. I will be working from home tomorrow.
Message.3: I will be late for standup or on first half leave tomorrow depending on how quickly the car issues will be resolved at the service center.
Message.4: I will be little bit late. Forgot phone at room while coming to office, got back to room again.
Message.5: I'm working from home today as well!
Message.6: I have not been feeling well since yesterday evening (headache and dizziness again) so I will be working lightly remotely for today at least with rests. As for tomorrow, I will keep you guys updated depending on how I feel. Take care, guys.
Message.7: Waiting for my turn for defense might be a bit late for standup.
Message.8: I will be out for a while, I will be having lunch outside. See you after lunch.
Message.9: Will be on leave for the first half. Nobody at home and ama not feeling well.
Message.10: I have tonsils. Body needs a bit of a rest. I will be working from home today.
Message.11: I'm experiencing throat pain and a severe headache from last night, so I'll be working remotely today.
Message.12: I'll be on first half leave. Need to visit government offices for some documents. Best of luck to me. I'll join in the second half.
Message.13: I will on leave today. Not feeling well.
Message.14: I am at college. I will be 1 hour late for office.
Message.15: I will be leaving about 60 to 90 minutes earlier today. And I am on leave tomorrow.
Message.16: Period cramps, I'll be on leave today.
Message.17: There is a small Janmastami puja at home, I will be on first half leave. Will join office in the second half.
Message.18: I'll be working from home for a couple of days. Sechen is alone and I need to be on standby for Puntu. I won't be able to join the stand-up today.
Message.19: I am leaving early today for some work. Have a nice weekend.
Message.20: I will be working from home for the first half and will be on leave for the second half of the day as I have to take Mamu to the hospital for some tests.
Message.21: As mentioned in the stand-up yesterday, I will be working first half from home and then taking a second half leave to attend a friend's wedding reception. Have a good weekend, everyone. Cheers!
Message.22: I'm dealing with severe back pain, so I'll be working from home. I might also step out for a hospital follow-up.
Message.23: I might be little late for standup.
Message.24: I might be a bit late due to a huge traffic jam. I might miss standup!
Message.25: I will be on first half leave. Will join office on second half of the day.
Message.26: As I mentioned yesterday, will be working from home today. The pooja is going on so I will have to miss the standup.
Message.27: I will be on leave today.
